meanings.definition: The quality or state of being vast.
meanings.sent1: The vastness of the ocean amazed the children on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The vastness of the desert stretched out before us endlessly.
meanings.sent3: The vastness of the ice cream tub made it impossible to finish in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes widened at the vastness of the library, filled with books from floor to ceiling.
meanings.sent5: The vastness of the night sky, sprinkled with stars, left him in awe.

meanings.sent1: The vastness of the forest made it easy to get lost among the trees.
meanings.sent2: The vastness of the warehouse was overwhelming, with rows of shelves disappearing into the distance.
meanings.sent3: The vastness of the cake was so tempting, she couldn't resist taking a second slice.
meanings.sent4: The vastness of the mountain range took her breath away as she stood at the base.
meanings.sent5: The vastness of the crowd at the concert made it hard to find her friends.
